paragraphs.text:
%md

Spark-Cassandra-Solr combo
==========================

>Warning: to use this demo, you'll need to have **Datastax Enterprise 4.7.0**

result.msg:
Spark-Cassandra-Solr combo

Warning: to use this demo, you'll need to have Datastax Enterprise 4.7.0

paragraphs.title: Prepare data
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.{SparkConf, SparkContext}
import com.datastax.spark.connector._
import org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD
import org.apache.spark.sql.SchemaRDD
import org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra.CassandraSQLContext
import com.datastax.spark.connector.cql.CassandraConnector
import scala.collection.JavaConversions._
import scala.collection.JavaConverters._
val cc = new CassandraSQLContext(sc)

var musicStyles:List[String] = Nil 
var countries:List[String] = Nil 

CassandraConnector(sc.getConf).withSessionDo { 
    session => {
        musicStyles = session.execute("SELECT style FROM spark_demo.performers_distribution_by_style").
            all().
            toList.
            map(row => row.getString("style")).
            toSet.
            toList.
            sorted
            
        countries = session.execute("SELECT DISTINCT name FROM spark_demo.countries").
            all().
            toList.
            map(row => row.getString("name")).
            toSet.
            toList.
            sorted   
    }
}

val context = z.getInterpreterContext()
def search(before:Object, after:Object):Unit = {
    z.run(3,context)
}
z.angularUnbind("countries")
z.angularUnbind("styles")
z.angularUnbind("album_year")
z.angularUnbind("artist_country")
z.angularUnbind("artist_style")
z.angularUnbind("updateDisplay")

z.angularUnwatch("updateDisplay")

z.angularBind("countries", countries.asJava)
z.angularBind("styles", musicStyles.asJava)
z.angularBind("album_year","[2010 TO *]")
z.angularBind("artist_country","USA")
z.angularBind("artist_style","Rock")
z.angularBind("updateDisplay",true)
z.angularWatch("updateDisplay",search _)

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.{SparkConf, SparkContext}
import com.datastax.spark.connector._
import org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD
import org.apache.spark.sql.SchemaRDD
import org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra.CassandraSQLContext
import com.datastax.spark.connector.cql.CassandraConnector
import scala.collection.JavaConversions._
import scala.collection.JavaConverters._
cc: org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra.CassandraSQLContext = org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra.CassandraSQLContext@5e5519e2
musicStyles: List[String] = List()
countries: List[String] = List()
context: org.apache.zeppelin.interpreter.InterpreterContext = org.apache.zeppelin.interpreter.InterpreterContext@7c77094c
search: (before: Object, after: Object)Unit

paragraphs.title: Search Form
paragraphs.text:
%angular

Search Analytics

List all albums release
after Album Year
of Artist Country artists
having style Artist Style


Search Form

result.msg:
Search Analytics

List all albums release
after Album Year
of Artist Country artists
having style Artist Style


Search Form

paragraphs.title: restrict with solr then aggregate with spark
paragraphs.text:
//List all albums  of American artists having style Rock released after 2010
cc.cassandraSql(s"""
    SELECT a.year,a.performer,a.title,p.country
    FROM spark_demo.albums a
    JOIN spark_demo.performers p
    ON a.performer = p.name
    WHERE a.solr_query='year:${z.angular("album_year")}' 
    AND p.solr_query='country:"${z.angular("artist_country")}" AND styles:*${z.angular("artist_style")}*'
""".stripMargin).
map(row => (row.getInt(0),row.getString(1),row.getString(2),row.getString(3))).
sortBy(tuple => (tuple._1,tuple._2,tuple._3)).
display("Year","Performer","Title","Country")
